title: 26,000 Visit Chevron
body: 26,000 visitors flocked to Chevron over Shabbos for Chayei Sarah weekend gatherings, prompting a large-scale security deployment with forces working around the clock to ensure safety.

title: Matzav Promotes Extremist Views
body: Matzav is criticized for amplifying Satmar's extreme views on Israel and the draft crisis, which don't represent the broader Torah community's stance.
